eye.Description: Specification for which eye was tracked.

startTime.Description: Eye-tracking timestamp corresponding to the onset (start) of the event.

stopTime.Description: Eye-tracking timestamp corresponding to the offset (stop) of the event.

xStart.Description: Horizontal gaze position at the start of the saccade.

yStart.Description: Vertical gaze position at the start of the saccade.

xEnd.Description: Horizontal gaze position at the end of the saccade.

yEnd.Description: Vertical gaze position at the end of the saccade.
